title: Mechanical Vibrations
description: Single and multi-degree-of-freedom systems as well as continuous systems are analyzed for their vibrational response characteristics using both exact and approximate methods.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ME 2202 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or AE 2220 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
